main_definition: A flightless bird with a black and white coloring, native to the Antarctic region.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used figuratively to describe someone who is awkward or clumsy in social situations
meanings_and_examples.example: He was as socially awkward as a penguin at a fancy dinner party.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used metaphorically to refer to a person being emotionally distant or cold
meanings_and_examples.example: She kept her distance from others, just like a solitary penguin on an icy shore.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A nickname for someone who is perceived as dull or uninteresting
meanings_and_examples.example: His presentation was so lackluster; he really brought the excitement of a penguin to it.
